::Hot Rod/Prowl/Epyon/Skyburst::

The fire blasts hit, blowing off the yellow finder on his back. Hot Rod
goes down in pain from this, allows him to avoid the iced fire balls.

Epyon shoots his whip, having it connect with D-13, to hold him there.
He then shoots two eye lasers at D-13.

Prowl launches two missiles at D-13.

Skyburst fires two plasma shots at D-13.

Hot Rod gets back up, and fires another two missiles at D-13.

Thats 2 lasers, 2 plasma charges, and 4 missiles heading at D-13. And
D-13 shouldn't be able to move because he is being heald by Epyon's
whip.
